services.name: Spa & Wellness
services.subtitle: A Ritual of Renewal
services.shortDescription: Deeply immersive wellness experience designed to restore balance and calm the senses.
services.description: A deeply immersive wellness experience designed to restore balance, calm the senses, and reconnect you with yourself. Our spa offers a sanctuary of peace where traditional healing meets modern luxury.

intro.title: Spa & Wellness Sanctuary
intro.subtitle: Reconnect with Your Inner Peace
intro.description: Step into a world of tranquility at our award-winning spa, where ancient healing traditions meet contemporary wellness practices.
intro.longDescription: Our Spa & Wellness center is more than just treatments—it's a holistic journey towards balance and rejuvenation. Each therapy is carefully crafted to address your unique needs, combining expert techniques with premium organic products in an atmosphere of complete serenity.

features.title: Holistic Treatments
features.description: Comprehensive therapies including massage, aromatherapy, reflexology, and energy healing.

features.title: Expert Therapists
features.description: Certified wellness practitioners with extensive training in traditional and modern techniques.

features.title: Premium Products
features.description: Organic, sustainably sourced products from trusted wellness brands.

features.title: Private Suites
features.description: Personal treatment rooms with temperature control and sound therapy.

features.title: Wellness Programs
features.description: Customized multi-day retreats including yoga, meditation, and nutrition.

features.title: Relaxation Areas
features.description: Post-treatment lounges with herbal tea and garden views.

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.comment: The most relaxing experience I've ever had. Pure bliss.

services.name: Luxury Event Hall
services.subtitle: Moments That Matter
services.shortDescription: A refined space crafted for weddings, celebrations, and gatherings that deserve elegance and atmosphere.
services.description: A refined space crafted for weddings, celebrations, and gatherings that deserve elegance and atmosphere. Our luxury event hall combines timeless sophistication with state-of-the-art facilities.

intro.title: Luxury Event Hall
intro.subtitle: Where Dreams Become Celebrations
intro.description: Transform your special moments into unforgettable celebrations in our exquisite event hall.
intro.longDescription: From initial planning to flawless execution, we ensure every detail reflects your unique style and exceeds expectations.

features.title: Grand Ballroom
features.description: 5,000 sq.ft. hall with 20-foot ceilings and crystal chandeliers.

features.title: Advanced AV Systems
features.description: State-of-the-art sound, lighting, and projection systems.

features.title: Flexible Layouts
features.description: Modular design for various event setups up to 500 guests.

features.title: Executive Suites
features.description: Private preparation rooms and VIP lounges.

features.title: Gourmet Catering
features.description: In-house culinary team with diverse menu options.

features.title: Event Coordination
features.description: Dedicated planners ensuring seamless execution.

services.name: Infinity Pool
services.subtitle: Where Water Meets Horizon
services.shortDescription: An open, tranquil space where time slows down and the landscape becomes part of your experience.
services.description: An open, tranquil space where time slows down and the landscape becomes part of your experience. Our infinity pool offers breathtaking views and serene relaxation.

intro.title: Infinity Pool
intro.subtitle: Merge with Nature's Majesty
intro.description: Experience the illusion of swimming into the horizon at our spectacular infinity pool.
intro.longDescription: More than a swimming facility—it's a sensory experience where water, sky, and landscape merge seamlessly.

features.title: Horizon Views
features.description: 25-meter infinity edge with panoramic mountain views.

features.title: Temperature Control
features.description: Maintained at 28-30°C year-round with advanced heating.

features.title: Underwater Features
features.description: Integrated sound system and LED mood lighting.

features.title: Poolside Luxury
features.description: Premium sun loungers and cabanas with butler service.

features.title: Hydrotherapy Area
features.description: Separate Jacuzzi heated to 38°C for relaxation.

features.title: Safety Features
features.description: Certified lifeguards and non-slip surfaces.

services.name: Fine Dining
services.subtitle: Curated Culinary Journeys
services.shortDescription: A thoughtful blend of local flavors and global inspiration, served with intention and artistry.
services.description: A thoughtful blend of local flavors and global inspiration, served with intention and artistry. Our fine dining restaurant offers an unforgettable gastronomic journey.

intro.subtitle: A Symphony of Flavors and Elegance
intro.description: Embark on a culinary adventure where master chefs transform the finest local ingredients into works of art.
intro.longDescription: Beyond exceptional food—it's a complete sensory journey with curated wine pairings, impeccable service, and elegant ambiance.

features.title: Chef's Table
features.description: Exclusive counter seating with kitchen view and chef interaction.

features.title: Seasonal Menus
features.description: Regularly updated menus featuring freshest local ingredients.

features.description: Over 500 labels from renowned vineyards worldwide.

features.title: Private Dining
features.description: Intimate rooms for special occasions with customized menus.

features.title: Cooking Classes
features.description: Interactive sessions with our master chefs.

features.title: Farm to Table

services.name: Nature Experiences
services.subtitle: Immersed in the Wild
services.shortDescription: Explore lush surroundings through mindful walks, fresh air, and moments of quiet discovery.
services.description: Explore lush surroundings through mindful walks, fresh air, and moments of quiet discovery. Connect with nature through our guided experiences.

intro.title: Nature Experiences
intro.subtitle: Rediscover Your Wild Spirit
intro.description: Step outside and immerse yourself in the breathtaking natural beauty surrounding our resort.
intro.longDescription: Designed to foster deeper connection with nature through education, adventure, and mindfulness.

features.title: Guided Nature Walks
features.description: Interpretive walks through diverse ecosystems with expert naturalists.

features.title: Bird Watching
features.description: Sessions to spot over 150 species of local and migratory birds.

features.title: Forest Meditation
features.description: Mindfulness sessions in serene forest clearings.

features.title: Wildlife Safaris
features.description: Jeep and walking safaris to observe native wildlife.

features.title: Photography Tours
features.description: Guided excursions focusing on landscape and wildlife photography.

features.title: Star Gazing
features.description: Nighttime astronomy sessions with telescopes.

services.name: Personal Concierge
services.subtitle: Thoughtfully Arranged
services.shortDescription: From arrival to departure, every detail is handled with care, discretion, and personalized attention.
services.description: From arrival to departure, every detail is handled with care, discretion, and personalized attention. Experience seamless service with our dedicated concierge team.

intro.subtitle: Your Gateway to Perfection
intro.description: Experience the ultimate in personalized service with our dedicated concierge team.
intro.longDescription: Transforms your stay into a truly bespoke experience with extensive local knowledge and impeccable attention to detail.

features.title: 24/7 Availability
features.description: Round-the-clock access for any request, anytime.

features.title: Pre-arrival Planning
features.description: Comprehensive itinerary planning before your arrival.

features.title: VIP Access
features.description: Exclusive access to sold-out events and premium experiences.

features.title: Transport Coordination
features.description: Seamless arrangement of private transfers and charters.

features.title: Dining Reservations
features.description: Priority bookings at sought-after restaurants.

features.title: Event Management

services.name: Car Rental
services.subtitle: Freedom to Explore
services.shortDescription: Premium vehicle rentals for your convenience and comfort during your stay.
services.description: Premium vehicle rentals for your convenience and comfort during your stay. Whether you need a luxury sedan or an SUV for family trips, we have the perfect vehicle for you.

intro.title: Premium Car Rental
intro.subtitle: Explore Chitwan in Comfort and Style
intro.description: Discover the freedom to explore Chitwan and beyond with our premium fleet of vehicles, maintained to the highest standards.
intro.longDescription: Our car rental service offers the ultimate convenience for exploring the region. With a diverse fleet ranging from compact cars for city driving to spacious SUVs for family adventures, we ensure your journey is comfortable, safe, and memorable.

features.title: Premium Fleet
features.description: Latest model vehicles including luxury sedans, SUVs, and 4x4s for all terrain types.

features.title: Flexible Rentals
features.description: Daily, weekly, and monthly rental options with unlimited mileage packages.

features.title: Full Insurance
features.description: Comprehensive coverage including collision damage waiver and third-party liability.

features.title: 24/7 Support
features.description: Round-the-clock roadside assistance and emergency support services.

features.title: GPS Navigation
features.description: Latest GPS systems with pre-loaded tourist attractions and scenic routes.

features.title: Child Safety
features.description: Child seats available in various sizes for different age groups.

includes: Full tank of fuel at pickup

services.name: Dry Sauna
services.subtitle: Heat Therapy Haven
services.shortDescription: Rejuvenate your body and mind in our premium wellness facility.
services.description: Our state-of-the-art dry sauna offers a serene retreat from the hustle and bustle of the outside world. Rejuvenate your body and mind in our premium wellness facility.

intro.title: Traditional Dry Sauna
intro.subtitle: Ancient Heat Therapy for Modern Wellness
intro.description: Experience the therapeutic benefits of traditional dry heat in our authentic Finnish-style sauna.
intro.longDescription: Our dry sauna combines centuries-old heat therapy with modern comfort and safety features. The dry heat helps detoxify the body, improve circulation, relieve muscle tension, and promote deep relaxation.

features.title: Finnish Design
features.description: Authentic cedar wood construction with optimal heat retention properties.

features.title: Temperature Control
features.description: Precise temperature regulation from 70°C to 100°C (158°F to 212°F).

features.title: Aromatherapy Options
features.description: Essential oil infusions including eucalyptus, pine, and lavender.

features.title: Relaxation Area
features.description: Adjacent cool-down lounge with hydration station and comfortable seating.

features.title: Safety Features
features.description: Emergency call buttons, timers, and temperature monitoring systems.

features.title: Private Sessions
features.description: Bookable private sessions for individuals, couples, or small groups.

saunaProtocol: Consult doctor if pregnant or with health conditions

services.name: Kids' Camp
services.subtitle: Adventures in Fun
services.shortDescription: Fun and safe activities for kids.
services.description: Engaging activities and supervised care for children of all ages. Our trained professionals ensure your kids have a fun, educational, and safe experience.

intro.title: Verdora Kids' Camp
intro.subtitle: Creative Adventures for Young Explorers
intro.description: A safe, engaging, and educational environment where children can play, learn, and make new friends while parents enjoy their vacation.
intro.longDescription: Our Kids' Camp is designed to provide children with memorable experiences through carefully curated activities that combine fun, education, and adventure. Supervised by certified childcare professionals in a secure, stimulating environment.

features.title: Certified Supervisors
features.description: First-aid certified staff with background checks and child development training.

features.title: Age-Appropriate Activities
features.description: Programs tailored for different age groups: 3-5, 6-9, and 10-12 years.

features.title: Educational Programming
features.description: Activities that combine learning with fun, focusing on nature, culture, and creativity.

features.title: Safe Environment
features.description: Secure facility with CCTV, controlled access, and safety protocols.

features.title: Flexible Hours
features.description: Half-day, full-day, and evening programs to suit family schedules.

features.title: Healthy Meals
features.description: Nutritious snacks and meals included, accommodating dietary restrictions.

requirements: List of allergies or medical conditions
